sourcesContent:
Welcome to Sockets Io Chat Rooms

    Chat Component
    {{room.name}}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { SocketService } from 'src/app/services/socket.service'; import { Room } from 'src/app/models/rooms'; @Component({ selector: 'app-rooms', templateUrl: './rooms.component.html', styleUrls: ['./rooms.component.css'] }) export class RoomsComponent { roomName : string = ''; rooms: Room[] = []; constructor( private socketService: SocketService ) { } onCreateRoom(roomName : string) { this.socketService.joinRoom(roomName); this.createDiv(roomName); this.roomName = ''; } createDiv(roomName : string): void { var room : Room = { name: roomName } this.rooms.push(room); } ngOnInit(): void { this.socketService.teste(); console.log("evento emitido"); } }
